faqs.question: How are the faculties of BVSR Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Ans.With a highly-skilled faculty on the BSVR campus, the Institute is committed to establishing an educational foundation and values in the hearts, minds and actions of future managers. Teachers are really up to date with current technology and scenarios.

faqs.question: Is BVSR Engineering College good?
faqs.answer: Ans.The goal of this college is to develop a high standard of ethics and respectability through the strategic efforts of our dedicated staff. The college ensures excellent technical education and provides good employment opportunities

faqs.question: What is the fee structure ofBVSR Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Ans.The total fees for B.Tech are around INR 1.4 Lakhs. For M.Tech, the total fees are INR 1.14 Lakhs. The fees may change year-wise

faqs.question: How are the hostel facilities ofBVSR Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Ans.Hostel rooms and facilities are excellent. Food provided in mess is hygienic and tasty. Rooms are so clean and spacious for a healthy and comfortable livingRead more:BVSR Engineering College Hostel

faqs.question: DoesBVSR Engineering Collegeprovide transportation facilities?
faqs.answer: Ans.There is a bus facility for all the students and faculty members. Bus facilities to all nearby locations are there for the students and the faculty members.

Section.name: About BVSR Engineering College Chimakurthy
Section.description:
Buchepalli Venkayamma Subbareddy Engineering College is a private college established in 2008 with the noble goal of providing high-quality technical education to rural students. It is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University and has been approved by AICTE. The college offers B.Tech and M.Tech programs across various specializations. B.Tech and M.Tech admissions are granted on the basis of AP-EAMCET and AP-PGECET exams respectively.
The college is spread over 12 acres of eco-friendly campus and equipped with outstanding facilities. It takes the utmost care in providing training and other life skills training to the students for campus selection as well as in finding the right place for the right students in the right position in the training industry.
The college provides B.Tech across five disciplines and M.Tech across two disciplines. Read on the table for more details:
Read more: BVSR Engineering College Courses and Fees
Admission to B.Tech is granted on the basis of marks secured by the candidates in AP-EAMCET. For M.Tech admission, candidates need to have a valid score in AP-PGECET.
Check BVSR Engineering College Cut off
The college has a separate team to monitor placements known as the Training and Placement cell. This cell guides students from time to time on how to prepare for company trend testing and interview rounds. The BVSR Engineering College assists its students not only in placement but also in market trends in various entrepreneurship areas.
Some of the top recruiters are:
Read more: BVSR Engineering College Placement
Read more: BVSR Engineering College Reviews
Ques. How are the faculties of BVSR Engineering College?
Ans. With a highly-skilled faculty on the BSVR campus, the Institute is committed to establishing an educational foundation and values in the hearts, minds and actions of future managers. Teachers are really up to date with current technology and scenarios.
Ques. Is BVSR Engineering College good?
Ans. The goal of this college is to develop a high standard of ethics and respectability through the strategic efforts of our dedicated staff. The college ensures excellent technical education and provides good employment opportunities
Ques. What is the fee structure of BVSR Engineering College?
Ans. The total fees for B.Tech are around INR 1.4 Lakhs. For M.Tech, the total fees are INR 1.14 Lakhs. The fees may change year-wise
Ques. How are the hostel facilities of BVSR Engineering College?
Ans. Hostel rooms and facilities are excellent. Food provided in mess is hygienic and tasty. Rooms are so clean and spacious for a healthy and comfortable living
Read more: BVSR Engineering College Hostel
Ques. Does BVSR Engineering College provide transportation facilities?
Ans. There is a bus facility for all the students and faculty members. Bus facilities to all nearby locations are there for the students and the faculty members.

BVSR Engineering College Courses.Details:
Specializations: Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering.
Duration: 4 years
Eligibility: 45% marks in 10+2 or equivalent with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics 
Selection Criteria: AP - EAMCET

Specializations: Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering.
Duration: 2 years
Eligibility: BE/B.Tech in the relevant stream with at least 50% marks
Selection Criteria: AP - PGECET
